name: Zirco Elf
skill: Deals 2314/2834 DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK. Targets deal 30%/36% less DMG for a limited time.
ability: Slightly increases Skill DMG by Divina team members at the start of each wave.

additional_data.description: The spirit of an elf based on one of the periodic elements. She's considered the "mood maker" by all the other group members. No matter how low their spirits get, her presence alone makes everyone feel better, Even when they get in an argument, she has everyone's feathers smoothed in a matter of minutes. In fact, she's the reason they've never had to cancel a show due to an all-out brawl.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 19/04/17- 10/05/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 07/05/17 - 10/05/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the total event points by 33% during the "Spirit Idol Competition" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 19/04/17- 10/05/17
